code: import React from'react';import'../styles/components/EmotionDisplay.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmotionDisplay=_ref=>{let{emotions,error}=_ref;if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-error",children:error});}if(!emotions){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-waiting",children:"Waiting for detection..."});}const dominantEmotion=Object.entries(emotions).reduce((a,b)=>a[1]>b[1]?a:b)[0];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"emotion-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Detected Emotion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-result",children:dominantEmotion}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-details",children:Object.entries(emotions).map(_ref2=>{let[emotion,value]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"emotion-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"emotion-label",children:emotion}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-progress",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"emotion-progress-bar",style:{width:"".concat(value,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"emotion-value",children:[value.toFixed(1),"%"]})]},emotion);})})]});};export default EmotionDisplay;
